Uses of Interface
com.basho.riak.client.query.filter.LogicalFilter

  • Packages that use LogicalFilter 
    Package Description
    com.basho.riak.client.query.filter
    The set of key filters that can be used in a BucketMapReduce

    • Uses of LogicalFilter in com.basho.riak.client.query.filter

      Classes in com.basho.riak.client.query.filter that implement LogicalFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLogicalFilter
      Shared code for the set of "logical" filters.
      class  LogicalAndFilter
      Group a bunch of filters together and filter in keys that match all
      class  LogicalFilterGroup
      Group a collection of filters
      class  LogicalNotFilter
      Filter in keys that aren't caught by the group
      class  LogicalOrFilter
      Filter in keys that match any of the filters specified
